on: 
  push:
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main
jobs:
  test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Cache CMake build directory
        uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: tests/build/
          key: cmake-${{ runner.os }}-${{ hashFiles('CMakeLists.txt', '**/*.cpp', '**/*.hpp') }}
          restore-keys: |
            cmake-${{ runner.os }}-
      - name: Build and run tests
        run: npm test
